aux_process module¶

aux_process.axis_plot(fixations, predicted_x, predicted_y, subj, train_sets=1)[source]¶
aux_process.compute_icc(x, y)[source]¶

This function computes the inter-class correlation (ICC) of the two classes represented by the x and y numpy vectors.
